Submodules¶

workflow.greedy_length_based¶

___Match making script___

The script used in Grasshopper within a GhPython component to match the wood with the available wood in the database. This is a sort of greedy algorithm working on the length parameter of the design element and the wood in the database.

workflow.greedy_length_based.generate_design_requirements(features, parts, project_id, wood_ids, part_index)¶
workflow.greedy_length_based.match_design(db, design_lengths, design_widths, part_index)¶

Module contents¶
